page.title: 17HOW I SPEND MY TIME
page.content: In my spare time I watch T.V. and if there is nothing I like, I draw pictures of scenes from 'Starwars' and from 'V', sometimes the pictures are boring, but some are good. Other times I go to my friend's house or on Thursdays I go 'Boys Brigade'. It's good there because all you do is play games. On Tuesday and Sunday I go swimming. At school my best subject is craft,swimming and using the computer. I also like the teachers, Mrs. Ali is the best. At home I help my Mum by doing the Hovering,washing the plates and drying them,I also help doing the beds. Sometimes I don't feel like doing jobs especially when I'm watching T.V.
